amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-61 to clarify communication requirements for eligible product developers and license holders regarding requests, offers, and delivery of product samples.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Pallone.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
